price: Он гоҳ гуфт: «Ин [Қуръон] чизе ҷуз ҷодуе, ки [аз дигарон] омӯхта шуда, нест
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faqāla in hādhā illā siḥ'run yu'tharu
